guys please meet @legioner (Dima) from our DevOps team
hi all!

Hi everyone, I have gone through the first step - Checking if Matomo is installed correctly on a7a5.kg.
You can check 1.5 In the “User Management” section make sure that you and other administrators have access rights to this site (level: view or admin).
Can I access the Matomo control panel? Or through whom can I interact with it and check if Matomo is working correctly?
please use matomo.a7a5.kg for the a7a5.kg website
How to get to matomo.a7a5.kg? I have no access through our vpn(muzpan) and without it also does not work. Do they require any credentials for authorization?
I don't have access either.

I need the sources of a7a5.pro site and the script that should connect there, or access to the code of a7a5.kg to familiarize myself with how it is done there. If it is possible to get the script in the matomo control panel, let me know.
looks correct url https://matomo.a7a5.io/
It's open. I need a username and password to get in.
@jarom can you provide access ?
@legioner jarom isn't in this topic. Please find Infra Requests channel. There are tickets for DevOps (desktop web version - not on mobile) we need to create a task there
jarom added to the channel by admin.

need your email address
hey everyone ✌️
please use internal email addresses only for communication

fazalievlinar@anykey.pro

Hey, I'm in. I'm trying to navigate here as stated in the documentation, but I can't find the “Websites → Management” section, when I try to navigate there, the section is empty.
In the screenshot I am on the Sites -> Manage page
Oh, it's my browser displaying that way, it's fine in another browser.
I've figured out the control panel. I just need to add the script code to a7a5.pro. How do I get the source code for editing?

why a7a5.pro?
we need for a7a5.kg and a7a5.io
@arnold we need the website source code and to be able to manage it and add your changes - @lfazliev I think you mixed the anykey.pro with a7a5.kg

please also not @lfazliev and @jarom for a7a5.kg the script should containe matomo.a7a5.kg url
for a7a5.io the script should contain the matomo.a7a5.io url
In the task that I was sent it says: Install the same Matomo tracker, with the same setSiteId, on the domains a7a5.pro and a7a5.site.
let me check, please
On a7a5.kg and a7a5.io it already works, metrics for both are displayed in matomo.a7a5.io
Should I set up cross-domain tracking for a7a5.kg, a7a5.io? - which is specified in the 3rd item of the list.

no please ask @jarom to create an alias on the haproxy:
matomo.a7a5.kg
matomo@a7a5.io
matomo.a7a5.io
So I need to move matomo for a7a5.kg to matomo.a7a5.kg? So it won't be on matomo.a7a5.io.
Jarom can help you with this

@lfazliev do you speak russian? can we have a short call a little later?

for a7a5.pro and a7a5.site we do not need Matomo
